snippet: Coach Steve Spurrier and his sixth-ranked Gamecocks showed they are capable of a big year after shutting down No. 5 Georgia.
abstract: South Carolina trounces Georgia, 35-7, in college football action.
lead_paragraph: Coach Steve Spurrier and his sixth-ranked Gamecocks showed they are capable of a big year after shutting down No. 5 Georgia.

headline.seo: Steve Spurrier and South Carolina Deliver a Pummeling and a Party
headline.main: Spurrier’s Team Delivers a Pummeling and a Party
headline.print_headline: Spurrier’s Team Delivers A Pummeling and a Party
